players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and I am the mafioso. Let's be careful with our words today."
You: "Charlie, claiming to be both the detective and mafioso is suspicious. Why reveal that now? We should focus on gathering more info before accusing anyone."
Bob: "Charlie, your claim is confusing and contradicts the game rules—there can't be one player who is both detective and mafioso. Can you clarify your role?"

Bob: "Charlie, your claim doesn't add up. One player can't be both detective and mafioso. I think you're trying to confuse us. We should focus on finding inconsistencies instead of making wild claims."
Charlie: "I am the detective and must uncover the mafioso. My claim was to test if you would believe me, not to confuse. I will proceed with investigating."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
